attributes.action: withdraw the UK from the European Human Right Legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is raised on two accounts.  

Firstly the case reported today of an Italian citizen who is a convicted murderer being allowed to remain in the UK on completion of his sentence.  This criminal and other murderers and sex offenders, who continue to offend whilst on bail, are using the legislation to demean the laws of the UK.

Secondly, in response to the recent murders of UK citizens, standing up to the gangs of rowdy youths who wander the streets of our towns with impugnity.  Curfews should be imposed on these youths, and laws on parental responsibility for their behaviour should be raised and enacted.
